scripts.build: yarn workspace @pull-docs/types build && yarn workspace @pull-docs/source-local-folder build && yarn workspace @pull-docs/source-bitbucket build && concurrently 'yarn workspace @pull-docs/cli build' 'yarn workspace @pull-docs/serialisers build' 'yarn workspace @pull-docs/plugins build' && yarn workspace @pull-docs/core build
scripts.clean: yarn workspace @pull-docs/types clean & yarn workspace @pull-docs/source-local-folder clean & yarn workspace @pull-docs/source-bitbucket clean & yarn workspace @pull-docs/cli clean & yarn workspace @pull-docs/serialisers clean & yarn workspace @pull-docs/plugins clean & yarn workspace @pull-docs/core clean
scripts.example: yarn build && concurrently --kill-others 'yarn workspace @pull-docs/examples dev' './node_modules/.bin/pull-docs serve -c ./pd.config.js' -p 8080
scripts.example:debug: yarn build && concurrently --kill-others 'yarn workspace @pull-docs/examples dev' 'node --inspect-brk --inspect ./node_modules/.bin/pull-docs serve -c ./pd.config.js' -p 8080
